question: The first-ever bilateral naval exercise ‘Samudra Shakti 2018’ has started between India and which country?
explanation: The first-ever bilateral naval exercise ‘Samudra Shakti 2018’ has started between Indian &  Indonesian Navy at the port of Surabaya in Indonesia from  November 12 to 18.  The aim of the exercise is to strengthen bilateral relations, expand maritime co-operation, enhance interoperability and exchange best practices. From Indian side,  INS Rana of the Eastern Fleet based at Visakhapatnam under the Eastern Naval Command is participating in the exercise.
